name: Augusto Esteves
content: HCI Lab @ IST HCI Lab Dec 09 UnitedXR Europe Augusto Esteves will be a speaker at the 2025 edition of UnitedXR Europe, in which he will talk about immersive speculative enactments and how to bring future scenarios and technologies to life using virtual reality (VR). Nov 12 ISS 2026 Congratulations to Diogo Lopes for having published his MSc work titled GazeMatch at ISS 2026, where he leverages the benefits of motion matching gaze interfaces without extensive refactoring of existing public display UIs. Aug 26 IJHCS We thank our collaborators from UNIST and KAIST for their contribution to our latest publication at the International Journal of Human - Computer Studies (IJHCS). Mar 13 MSU Visit Augusto Esteves delivered a seminar to the Department of Media & Information of Michigan State University on interaction design at the intersection of ubiquitous and spatial computing.
